trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Orizaba
There were no other sightings in Orizaba on or around April 10th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsIn this light the UFO film with my cell phone from Sony Ericsson W810, one night we went to observe UFOs Mariano Escobedo, Ver. Because the brightness of the sky is minimal compared with the city of Orizaba, one can observe that the UFO is very low, almost over the houses, was suddenly shut down and we did not see where he went, then accompanied me Camacho Abel Pacheco. Date: April 10, 2007. Report and Video: Rossana Tejeda Lopez of The Orizaba's Sleepy Tejeda
Summary: Ufo bright in the night sky
